word_mean: 食孑孓鱼，百万鱼：多种食孑孓的小鱼名，见Lebistes reticulatus

sentence.Network_en: Lenin lives on in the minds and hearts of millions of people.
sentence.Network_cn: 列宁永远活在亿万人民的心中。

sentence.Network_en: Powell's unusual journey to high office is an inspiration to millions.
sentence.Network_cn: 鲍威尔升任高官的不寻常历程对数以百万计的人都是一个激励。

sentence.Network_en: He called Mr Mandela a hero who had inspired millions.
sentence.Network_cn: 他称曼德拉先生为鼓舞了数百万民众的英雄。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 1. 百万2. millions 数百万3. 无数
for millions of americans the problem is nickel ., 为数以百万计的美国人的问题是镍.
there may be millions of worlds in the milky way galaxy ., 银河系中也许有几百万个世界.
When a GIRL is quiet ... millions of things running in her mind ., 当一个女孩安静的时候 . . . 成千上万的东西正在她的脑海闪过.

list.abs: 兆彩(Mega Millions)是北美有着最高中奖纪录的大盘玩法。该玩法开始于1996年8月31日。
万的英语是什么?_百度知道 ... 百万 million 千万 ten million 亿 a hunred million.
Fertilizer consumption rose from 0.76 million tons in 1966 to 2.38 million tons in 1972 ., 化肥消费量从 1966年的 76 万吨增加到 1972年的 238 万吨.
初中重点短语_百度文库 ... not …. any more 不再。。 。 millions of 数百万的 run away 潜逃，逃跑.

entry.def: A million or one million is the number 1,000,000.

example.ex: Up to five million people a year visit the county...
example.tran: 每年参观这个县的人多达500万。

entry.tran: 数百万的；大量的；数不清的;不计其数的
entry.def: If you talk about millions of people or things, you mean that there is a very large number of them but you do not know or do not want to say exactly how many.

example.ex: The programme was viewed on television in millions of homes.
example.tran: 无数家庭通过电视收看了这个节目。

means.word_mean: 1. a very large indefinite number (usually hyperbole)

auth_sentence.content: They have been doing this for millions of years.
auth_sentence.res_content: They have been doing this for millions of years.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They have been doing this for millions of years.

auth_sentence.content: The natural world contains millions of types of molecules.
auth_sentence.res_content: The natural world contains millions of types of molecules.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The natural world contains millions of types of molecules.

auth_sentence.content: Hundreds of millions of people pay them every month.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hundreds of millions of people pay them every month.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hundreds of millions of people pay them every month.

Sentence.sentence: Millions of American families may now be in the initial stage of their responses to the current crisis, working together and supporting one another through the early months of unemployment.
Yet he also empowered millions of people by giving them access to cutting-edge technology
In the process he brought about great changes in computing, music, telecoms and the news business that were painful for existing firms but welcomed by millions of consumers.
Each side provides the winter home for millions of monarchs.
The music service This Is My Jam helps people navigate the tens of millions of tracks now available instantly via Spotify and iTunes.
Such programs can be expensive, of course, but cheap compared with the millions already invested in scholarships and grants for kids who have little chance to graduate without special support.
